entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Periods of rain beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
